mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM product ORDER BY 1 DESC) a WHERE ROWNUM <= ${page} * 10) b WHERE b.rn > (${page} - 1) * 10
mapper.insert: insert into product (pdt_id, cat_id, subcat_id, pdt_nm, pdt_price, pdt_img, pdt_brand) values(product__seq.nextval, #{catId}, #{subcatId}, #{pdtNm}, #{pdtPrice}, #{pdtImg}, #{pdtBrand})
mapper.update: update product set pdtViews=hit_count+1 where pdt_id=#{pdtId}
